therapies.title: MY THERAPIES
therapies.subtitle: Discover the different therapeutic approaches I offer for your well-being and energetic harmonization.

reiki.title: REIKI
reiki.description: Reiki is a Japanese energy therapy that uses universal life energy to promote physical, emotional, mental and spiritual healing. During a session, the practitioner places their hands on or above the receiver's body to channel this energy, eliminate blockages and restore harmony.

vibratory.title: VIBRATORY HEALING
vibratory.description: Vibratory healing offers a holistic approach using sound, light and energy vibrations to balance body, mind and soul. Based on universal frequencies, these techniques including singing bowls, mantras and chromobioenergy reduce stress, improve sleep, relieve pain and increase energy.
benefits: Personalized session according to your needs

meditation.title: MEDITATION
meditation.description: Meditation uses various techniques such as mindfulness, guided and transcendental meditation, as well as mantras like the OM sound, to promote relaxation, self-awareness and emotional healing. It reduces stress, anxiety and depression, improves concentration and mental clarity, and promotes inner peace.
benefits: Reduction of stress, anxiety and depression

chromobio.title: CHROMOBIOENERGY
chromobio.description: ChromoBioEnergy uses color as mysterious music to reharmonize our body and mind. Each person is born with a unique capital of colors, and this method, adapted to individual needs, treats various imbalances. Thanks to the chromoemotional tests developed by Evelyne Monsallier, the dissonances of your inner melody are detected and corrected.

amma.title: AMMA MASSAGE
amma.description: Energetic seated massage of Japanese origin that works on energy meridians to release tension and promote energy circulation.
